TEXT.citation: Early, R. J., & Whitehorn, J. (2003). One hundred Paiwan texts. Pacific Linguistics, Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, The Australian National University.
TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @book{100paiwantexts, author = {Robert Early and John Whitehorn}, title = {One Hundred Paiwan Texts}, year = {2003}, publisher = {Pacific Linguistics, Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, The Australian National University}}

S.FORM: pai aitsu uri maleva men tjanusun a naqemati a Tsemas.
pai aico ori maleva men tjanoson a naqemati a Cemas.
S.TRANSL: And now we will rejoice in you, creator God.

S.FORM: pai aitsu a i katsauan tisun a Tsemas a naqemati, mavan a muri nia sikaleva.
pai aico a i kacaoan tison a Cemas a naqemati, mavan a mori nia sikaleva.
S.TRANSL: It is you, God, who created this world, and for that we rejoice in you.

S.FORM: sa?a pai aitsu su pinasułivatjan amen a Tsemas, su kinizangan amen tusa nia pinatsalivat a qadaw; malevaleva men aravats.
sa?a pai aico so pinasoljivatjan amen a Cemas, so kinizangan amen tosa nia pinacalivat a qadaw; malevaleva men aravac.
S.TRANSL: And now you, God, have given us peace, you have guarded us through the past days; we rejoice greatly in you.

S.FORM: qau pai aitsu imazanga men i tjaiqayaw tjanusun a namaqepu a uri semenasenay a uri semupusupu tua su pazazekazekatj a Tsemas.
qao pai aico imazanga men i tjaiqayaw tjanoson a namaqepo a ori semenasenay a ori semoposopo toa so pazazekazekatj a Cemas.
S.TRANSL: And now here we are before you gathered to sing and to read your commands, God.

S.FORM: pai sa?a uła men a nałemaluay, uła men a su kinizangan a kemasi patagił a patje maqatsuvung tusa nia kinaqepuan.
pai sa?a olja men a naljemaloay, olja men a so kinizangan a kemasi patagilj a patje maqacovong tosa nia kinaqepoan.
S.TRANSL: So may we understand, and may we be guarded by you from the beginning to the end of our gathering.

S.FORM: uła men a napuzangar, uła men a natemavelak uta tua su pitsul tua su kiłivak tusa nia kinaqepuan.
olja men a napozangar, olja men a natemavelak ota toa so picol toa so kiljivak tosa nia kinaqepoan.
S.TRANSL: May we be joyful, and may we receive also your strength and love in our gathering.

S.FORM: sa?a aitsu a nia kiqaung a nia levan nia pinaka tjanusun a ti Yisu-sama.
sa?a aico a nia kiqaong a nia levan nia pinaka tjanoson a ti Yiso-sama.
S.TRANSL: And now our prayer and praise is made through you, Jesus.
